column1: Traffic reports will resume Wednesday November 9 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: The Fire Dept is receiving several calls reporting smoke, or smell of smoke.
Smoke from wildfires in Estill Co is affecting the Lexington area due to southeasterly winds.
The Fire Dept is responding as appropriate to any related calls.
A open burning ban is in effect immediately and lasting until 7 a.m. Friday 11/11.
